mapper.sql: id, uuid, name, cover_img, userId, description, create_time, score
mapper.select: select count(1) from menu_summary where name like concat(concat(#{word}, '%'), '%')
select from menu_summary where name like concat(concat(#{word}, '%'), '%') order by score desc
select from menu_summary where recommend_num > #{mixScore} order by recommend_num desc, score desc limit #{start}, #{limit}
select count(1) from menu_summary where date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{recentDays} DAY) <= create_time
select count(1) from menu_summary where MONTH(create_time) = MONTH(now()) - #{months}
select from menu_summary where MONTH(create_time) = MONTH(now()) - #{months} order by score desc limit #{start}, #{limit}
select count(1) from menu_summary where date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{recentDays} DAY) <= create_time
select count(1) from menu_summary where YEAR(create_time) = YEAR(now())
select from menu_summary where uuid in (select menu_id from category_menu_rel r where r.category_id = #{category})
select name from menu_food where menu_id = #{uuid}
select from menu_step where menu_id = #{uuid} order by orderI ASC
select count(1) from menu_other_user_rel where user_id = #{userId} and menu_id = #{uuid}
mapper.update: update menu_summary set collect_num = collect_num + 1 where uuid = #{uuid}
update menu_summary set browse_num = browse_num + #{nums} where uuid = #{uuid}
mapper.insert: insert into menu_summary(uuid, name, cover_img, userId, description) values(#{summaryInfo.uuid},#{summaryInfo.name}, #{summaryInfo.cover_img}, #{userId}, #{summaryInfo.desc})

insert into menu_food(menu_id, name, num) values
(#{uuid}, #{food.name}, #{food.num})

insert into menu_step(menu_id, description, img, orderI) values
(#{uuid}, #{step.desc}, #{step.img}, #{step.order})
